The trip with the main character of a drama


Dramatrip takes the lead in securing cultural competitiveness along with regional economic development
by introducing the location of domestic drama filming locations and neighboring companies

Korean Drama Spreads Around the World


We will guide you to the relevant locations according to the situation where K content is attracting the attention of people around the world.
It will lead the revitalization of the domestic tourism industry.
